LanguageData.FOU.Letters.NaniteActivated.Content: The higher dimensional nanites within {PAWN_labelShort} have been activated by critical injuries.\n\n{PAWN_possessive} consciousness will now be contained by the nanites until their body is restored to a state capable of sustaining consciousness.
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.NaniteActivated.Label: Nanite Activated
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.NaniteRevertMutant.Content: Mutant within {TARGET_labelShort} has been reverted by {CASTER_labelShort}'s higher dimensional nanites.{2}
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.NaniteRevertMutant.Label: Mutant Reverted
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.MetalhorrorImplantRemoved.Co: The metalhorror within {TARGET_nameDef} has been excised by {CASTER_nameDef}'s higher dimensional nanites.
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.DiseaseCured.Content: The following conditions in {PAWN_labelShort} have been cured by higher dimensional nanites:\n{1}
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.DiseaseCured.Label: Nanite Immunity
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.ExistenceAnchor.Content:
{PAWN_labelShort} has departed the colony.

Authorization for {1} protocol is confirmed.

Activate recall protocol for immediate retrieval of {PAWN_labelShort}?
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.ExistenceAnchor.Label: Recall: {PAWN_labelShort}
